title: The Fall
description: Alex, a corporate operative, orchestrates a data heist that turns into a deadly setup. Forced into hiding, Alex undergoes a full-body transformation to erase their past identity and seeks refuge with Silo Pete, an old cybercriminal recluse.

title: Project Echo
description: Alex and Pete uncover Dynacorp’s horrifying experiment to digitize human consciousness, discovering Alina in the process. The data suggests the project was sabotaged from within, leaving behind fractured minds.

title: The Ghost Rig
description: To avoid Dynacorp’s pursuit, the team takes their operation off-land, acquiring a nuclear-powered submarine to serve as a mobile base.

title: Echoes in the Deep
description: The team encounters strange signals from the ocean depths, leading to the discovery of fractured, digitized minds trapped in an ancient ruin.

title: Black Kite
description: As the team retrieves Black Kite, they begin to realize Alex may be more entangled in this mystery than she ever realized. The ruins react to her presence.

title: The City That Does Not Die
description: The team finds an impossible ruin on the ocean floor—an ancient construct where data, memories, and digital minds persist beyond time.

title: The Bridge Opens
description: The team makes contact with Sam again and finalizes their deal, receiving an enigmatic artifact known as 'The Bridge' in exchange for Black Kite. Alex becomes the first to interact with it, stepping into a strange new dimension where she learns about 'crossing' and the permanent transformation it entails.

title: Irreversible Transformation
description: As Alex struggles with her partial connection to the Bridge, she begins seeking alternative ways to understand it without taking another step forward. Meanwhile, Emilia grows increasingly afraid of losing Alex to an unknown fate.

title: Pete’s Self-Discovery Arc
description: Alex, Alina, and Emilia conspire to nudge Pete toward an overdue realization about his sexuality by maneuvering him into a gay bar without directly confronting him.

title: The Bridge: A Path Unknown
description: Alex's growing entanglement with the Bridge forces her to reconsider the nature of the crossing, the irreversible transformations involved, and the implications for her identity and those she cares about.

title: The Cradle: A Failed Crossing
description: The crew revisits the mysterious underwater structure known as the Cradle, uncovering unsettling evidence of failed crossings and an unknown intelligence reaching out to them.

title: The Nexus Cure: A Way to Stop the Crossing
description: Dr. Nyati has a breakthrough—if Alex's mind can be fully transferred into a synthetic body, she will be severed from the Bridge's influence, just as Alina is immune.

title: Pete's Awakening
description: The crew orchestrates a scheme to help Pete explore his bisexuality by nudging him into a serendipitous encounter at a gay bar.

title: Nexus Revision & The Search for Echo Survivors
description: Alex shifts Nexus research priorities toward treating Echo Syndrome while searching for potential survivors. Meanwhile, an intelligence deal reveals new threats in cognitive replication research.

title: Pete’s Awakening
description: The crew orchestrates a plan to push Pete towards self-discovery by subtly steering him into a gay bar, with Emilia acting as his wing-woman. The mission unfolds as Pete remains oblivious until the last moment, forcing him into an unexpected realization about himself.

title: Alex’s Growing Fears
description: As Nexus research progresses, Alex is forced to confront the potential dangers of crossing the Bridge. Her fear of losing herself is compounded by her deepening relationship with Emilia, culminating in a defining conversation about their future.
